Welcome to the Causal Inference in R Blog! Here you'll find more information about our packages, book, courses, and other information about causal inference.

## R Packages

We develop opinionated R packages to make causal inference in R easier and more principled. Our packages are designed to work well with each other and in the [Tidyverse](https://www.tidyverse.org/). They're also quite modular, meaning you can pick and choose the packages you like to work in a wide variety of settings.
